metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18438 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: Qemu has integer overflows because IOReadHandler and its associated functions use a signed integer data type for a size value.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> as of 2020-05-13, proposed fix not commited sbeattie> Red Hat asserts that they have audited the code in question and that no code paths can lead to an integer overflow. mdeslaur> marking as not-affected, as there is no indication this leads to a security issue.

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
